name: The Identity Distorter
desc: Famous personalities describing their identity in first person basis using tweets that other people have used for them.

name: Augmented Rupaiyya
desc: Augmented reality app made with Vuforia that summons Pokemons on different notes of Indian currencies.

name: Listen To This KGP!
desc: A Chrome extension built for the LTTK community to recommend favorite songs to their college-mates.

name: Exam Condenser
desc: The Chrome Extension that skips user marked 'redundant' portions of video lectures, thus saving collective time.

name: Pool-ed
desc: Product (in-development) boosts retention rate of MOOC courses through an incentive based system for learners.

name: Listen, TREX!
desc: Made the Chrome game voice-activated to prank my cousins into believing I posess magic.

name: Algorithmic Planning
desc: Algorithms to automate the task of urban planning by taking in citizen contributed data.

name: Wireless Mandala
desc: Interactive wireless Mandala pattern generated via accelerometer data transmitted via OSC messages.

name: Psychedelia
desc: Real time visualization of trippy desi music with generative geometry built using beat amplitude data.

name: The Indian Time Machine
desc: Portal of memories of nostalgia from the good old India of the 90's. 1.8k+ likes and 250+ shares till date.

name: Moons of Pandora
desc: Twitter Bot that creates fictional fantasy moons every half an hour since 24th September 2016.
